text: is a Japanese football player for Sagan Tosu. ==Career== While playing for Biwako Seikei Sport College, Miya was selected as the best player in the Kansai Student Football League.http://www.jufa- kansai.jp/meet/student/17_pdf/hyo_1.pdf In January 2018, Vissel Kobe opted to sign him.https://web.gekisaka.jp/news/detail/?218678-218678-fl ==Club statistics== Updated to 19 February 2019.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 76 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
